comments:
When I try to re-generate a test from an existing recording, I get an exception with the following stack trace before the page where I can chose my .recmodel file is displayed :
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: i/o error (java.io.FileNotFoundException: ile:C:\RPT\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui_4.1.1.v200602281515.jar!\icons\full\obj16\gen_record_obj.gif (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect.))
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3349)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3272)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageLoader.load(ImageLoader.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageDataLoader.load(ImageDataLoader.java:22)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData.<init>(ImageData.java:373)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.<init>(Image.java:784)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.test.provisional.recorder.ui.wizards.RecLocationWizardPage.getObjectImage(RecLocationWizardPage.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.testgen.ui.wizards.FileLocationSelectionWizardpage$ExtendedLabelProvider.getImage(FileLocationSelectionWizardpage.java:91)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.DecoratingLabelProvider.updateLabel(DecoratingLabelProvider.java:338)
[...]

Then the page is displayed, but it lacks the icons and labels of my .recmodel files. Still I can chose one and the rest of the wizard works.
This is a duplicate of bugzilla 131359 fixed by Jerome Gout.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 131359 ***

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
